thread.title: Daniel Balaji to play a stylish villain in Arvind Swamy Ritika Singh Nandita Shweta Vanangamudi - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Daniel Balaji to play a stylish villain in Arvind Swamy Ritika Singh Nandita Shweta Vanangamudi - Tamil Movie News

title: Daniel Balaji to play a stylish villain in Arvind Swamy Ritika Singh Nandita Shweta Vanangamudi - Tamil Movie News

persons.name: arvind swamy ritika singh nandita shweta vanangamudi

text: Arvind Swamy to team up with the most happening young director After getting positive reviews from fans and critics for his performance as a emotional villain in Ilayathalapathy Vijay's 'Baiavaa', actor Daniel Balaji is now acting in two promising projects. One is director Gaurav Narayanan's 'Ippadai Vellum' which has Udhayanidhi Stalin and Manjima Mohan in lead roles. The 'Kaakha Kaakha' actor is currently busy shooting for his role in this film produced by Lyca. Now he has bagged the offer to play the lead villain with a ageless charmer. Yes. Daniel Balaji will be seen as the lead villain in director Selva's 'Vanangamudi' which will have Arvind Swamy, Ritika Singh and Nandita Shweta in lead roles. Arvind and Nandita will be seen as cops in this film. Balaji confirms that he will play a stylish villain in this film which will be a complete contrast to his recent outings. Arvind Swamy has set new standards for the stylish and suave villain in Tamil cinema with 'Thani Oruvan' and 'Bogan' that released a couple of days ago. It will be interesting to wait and watch how Daniel Balaji handles this challenge and give his track record we can be assured that he will come out with a fantastic performance.
